settings.question_faqs: I have a question about an item, who can I contact?
settings.answer_faqs: For any questions regarding Rolling Square's products, you can contact us at support@rollingsqua.re or use our live chat!

We offer a 2 year limited warranty for all Rolling Square products. Our warranty covers any manufacturing or workmanship defects but does not cover damages that may have resulted from normal wear and tear, misuse/abuse or modification of the product.
Our lifetime warranty, when offered, covers exactly the same defects as our standard 2 years warranty, but it extends the coverage period.

If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, you may return the item in its original condition within 30 days of receipt for a refund (not including the original shipping fee).

Only items purchased directly from Rolling Squareâ€™s online store or Indiegogo will be accepted. If you purchased your items from authorized retailers (online or offline), please get in touch with them directly for returns.
Returned items must be in their original packaging, including any accessories, manuals, and documentation, where applicable.
Non-returnable items include items purchased through retailers, incorrect products purchased, and damaged products through customer mishandling.

Please note that original shipping charges are non-refundable except in cases where we have made a shipping error. All VAT/Import taxes are the responsibility of the receiver and are non-refundable.

settings.question_faqs: How can I return an item?
settings.answer_faqs: If you would like to return an item that you suspect is defective, please contact support@rollingsqua.re. We will issue a replacement or store credit for approved warranty requests. The defective item may need to be returned to us in some cases.

settings.question_faqs: How long does it take for my order to be dispatched?
settings.answer_faqs: Your order will be shipped within 48 hours of confirmation.

Shipping normally takes 5-18 working days. In cases where customs processing is slow, delivery can take up to 6 weeks.
For more detailed tracking information for international shipments, you can copy and paste your tracking number into the search bar here: https://track.aftership.com/ or on the destination country's national post.

Items are also subject to customs clearance and may be held until duties and taxes are paid. As the importer/consignee, it is your responsibility to pay duties and taxes. We are not able to refund customs fees or additional charges that must be paid to get your package delivered. If your order is returned to us, please contact support@rollingsqua.re.

settings.question_faqs: My address is wrong but the order has already shipped.
settings.answer_faqs: If your package has already shipped, we can't change your address at this time. If your address was wrong the package will be shipped back to us. Once we receive it we will ship it to you again, please contact us at support@rollingsqua.re to provide the correct address.

settings.question_faqs: By booking at the tracking number, the order seems stuck.
settings.answer_faqs: Depending on the destination country, tracking numbers may be slow to update (i.e. USPS). Most of the times the order is on its way and will be delivered on time or with a small delay. If the shipping time has exceeded our shipping timelines by more than 8 business days, please contact the courier directly. We receive the same tracking as you do once shipped and unfortunately do not have insight into any additional information. If they are not able to locate your shipment, contact us at support@rollingsqua.re.

settings.question_faqs: Where can I find my tracking number?
settings.answer_faqs:
You can find your tracking information by logging into your Rolling Square account from our site's homepage. Once you find the order you'd like to track on the Order History page of your account, you can locate the tracking link below the product information on this order's page.

Please allow some time for tracking to update. For additional shipping & tracking inquiries please contact the courier directly.

settings.free_shipping_text_1: Free Express Shipping for all orders

settings.heading: Why Rolling Square?
settings.slide-des: A rolling square is a solved problem.â€¨ Solving problems is the philosophy of our team and the foundation of our product design process.

settings.banner_des: Do you have a question or do you need support for an order? Ask us anything!

settings.heading: mission
settings.slide-des: We are tech minimalists. We aim at creating actually useful products, meant to make everyday life a little bit easier. We work with three goals in mind: functionality, premium quality and high end design.

settings.heading: compatible with every smartphone and portable device
settings.slide-des:
Dual: Lightning for Apple devices (iPhone, iPad, Airpods) + Micro-USB devices, in a single proprietary connector

USB-C: compatible with most recent Android phones and latest generation portable devices

settings.heading: vision
settings.slide-des: Our vision is to remove barriers between people and technology. We believe that the best technology is beautiful, yet natural and intuitive to use. The core of our design process is making products that fade in the background, yet improving our daily life in a seamless way.

settings.heading: approach
settings.slide-des: Our products are built on the feedback of hundreds of thousands of users who are part of the Rolling Square family. We combine this feedback with the design expertise of our italian product designers, to nail down every detail of our products, from usefulness and durability, to aesthetical value.

settings.heading: Ambrogio Tacconi
settings.slide-des: "Rolling Square means to roll your brain when you see our visual communication and our products"

settings.heading: lola
settings.slide-des: "My goal is to roll out any problems or concerns in our customers and community."

settings.heading: Gianluca Sigismondi
settings.slide-des: â€œDo you remember Hyphen 2's sexy profile in the campaign video? The secret lies in the roll settings on rendering engine ;)"

settings.heading: Ricotta
settings.slide-des: â€œWaf waf ðŸŽ¾   â€œ

settings.heading: CAREERS
settings.slide-des:
Rolling Square is growing! Are you interested in joining our team?

â€¨â€¨We are looking for talented and like-minded people, with a passion for technology and product design. We are hiring in the fields of product design, marketing and software development. If you work in a different field but think you'd be a good fit at Rolling Square shoot us an email anyway, worst case scenario we'll make new friends!â€¨â€¨

Send us your CV or Portfolio and let us know why you'd like to join our team:

settings.heading: based in switzerland
settings.slide-des: We are a team of crazy innovators based in Switzerland, from all over the world. We never stop looking for problems to solve, constantly thinking about how we can improve life through technology. We love our job and the community of like-minded people that surrounds us! ðŸ˜Ž

settings.heading: A power bank has never been so light and compact
settings.slide-des:
Standard power banks are too bulky to be carried in your pocket and often left behind.
TAUÂ® is so small and light (40g/1.4oz) that you will forget you have it with you, until you need it.

settings.heading: Always Charged
settings.slide-des: Thanks to its dock, you will never forget to charge TAUÂ®. Once you get back at home, just place your keys with TAUÂ® in its magnetic charging dock, so when you go out, you will always have a fully charged power bank with you.

settings.heading: Effortless setup
settings.slide-des: Place the repositionable nano suction layer where you prefer, plug the cable and TAUÂ® is ready to use. And if you are a DIY aficionado and 100% sure that you aren't going to move your dock, you can also use the screws included in the packaging.

settings.heading: The Swiss Army Knife of Cables
settings.slide-des:
A single everyday carry cable to charge your devices. 
Yes, all of them.

settings.heading: N52 Magnets & Anti-slide system
settings.slide-des: inCharge 6 comes with N52 magnets, the highest grade achievable, and our proprietary Anti-slide system, so that you'll never lose it from your keys.

settings.heading: tough and durable
settings.slide-des:
Cable Guards: the TPU cable guard protects the cable from reaching its critical bending level, preventing damage of the copper wires.

Metal housing: the zync-aluminium alloy ensures componentsâ€™ protection and stability over time. You couldnâ€™t break it if you tried.

Nylon reinforcement: The cable is equipped with a nylon fiber cover, which significantly improves friction resistance.

settings.heading: USB and USB-C
settings.slide-des:
USB: With over 7 Billion USB ports around the world, inChargeÂ® 6 can be plugged almost everywhere.

USB-C: Most of the latest generation devices are moving to USB-C ports, so inChargeÂ® 6 has got you covered.

settings.heading: USB-C and Dual
settings.slide-des:
USB-C: compatible with the latest portable devices and smartphones that feature USB-C ports.

Dual: compatible with Lightning for Apple devices (iPhone, iPad, Airpods) + Micro-USB devices, in a single proprietary connector.

settings.heading: The Best Wireless Earbuds at an affordable price.
settings.slide-des: We have designed HYPHENÂ® 2 with components used in earbuds that cost three times as much. We then added new technologies never seen before on other wireless earbuds, and cut out the middlemen to make them truly affordable.

settings.heading: 36 hours of total playtime
settings.slide-des:
Hyphen 2 ensure battery for days. For real.

Earbuds: 9 hours

Case: 27 hours

settings.heading: Pocket sized Charging Case
settings.slide-des:
HYPHENÂ® 2â€™s case has undergone months of real-world testing to achieve the best shape and size needed to be truly comfortable in your pocket.
Extensive work by our engineering team allowed the case to be packed with technology, while retaining its portable size. Wireless charging, gyroscopic sensor, and an industry leading battery life didn't come at the expense of compactness.

settings.heading: with Qi certification
settings.slide-des:
HYPHEN 2 features Qi wireless charging without compromising in size. 
After AirPods , itâ€™s the smallest model to feature this technology.

settings.heading: Premium audio quality
settings.slide-des:
HYPHENÂ® 2 guarantees a truly immersive listening experience, thanks to:

aptXâ„¢ Audio
aptXâ„¢ technology compresses and decompresses audio in order to transmit the audio waves over Bluetooth without losing any quality. This process ensures you get the most out of every sound you hear through your HYPHENÂ® 2.

6Î¼ Composite PEEK Driver
Our 6Î¼ polymer composite PEEK driver provides a full range listening experience, satisfying even at lower volumes.

settings.heading: FHSâ„¢ eartips
settings.slide-des:
Foam
The inner foam precisely adapts to different ear canal shapes for the best fit and isolation.

Hard Silicone Canal
HYPHENÂ® 2's custom designed silicone shore delivers accurate audio quality, with thick bass and crystal clear mid-high frequencies.

Soft Silicone Dome
The soft silicone layer provides comfort and grip, so you can listen to music for hours at a time.

settings.heading: Full touch controlâ„¢
settings.slide-des:
HYPHENÂ® 2 gives you a level of control over your phone never seen before, with 8 different commands.
Our Full Touch Controlâ„¢ technology will let you stay off your smartphone for most actions.

settings.heading: QualcommÂ® Chipset
settings.slide-des:
One of the most stable and compact Bluetooth 5 chipsets ever made by Qualcomm, the worldwide leader in chipsets, with 35 years of experience.
A powerful tri-core processor architecture ensures secure and instant connection, supports aptXâ„¢ audio delivery and optimises battery consumption.

settings.heading: QUALCOMMÂ® CVCâ„¢ NOISE CANCELLATION TECHNOLOGY
settings.slide-des: A suite of algorithms works on the transmission and receiving paths of voice calls to deliver optimal voice quality. It suppresses background audio such as ambient noise, road noise and other people talking, to deliver a clear call quality.

settings.heading: 4 microphones
settings.slide-des:
Each HYPHENÂ® 2 features two microphones facing opposite directions.
The cVcâ„¢ algorithm analyzes outside noise along with your voice to emit cancelling sound waves. The result is an isolated voice, as if you were calling from a quiet room.

settings.heading: IP55 dust waterproof certified
settings.slide-des: HYPHENÂ® 2 has been certified for resistance against dust ingress and water jets from any direction, allowing you to run under the rain without having to worry about your earbuds.

settings.heading: QI Certified Wireless Charging
settings.slide-des:
Still absent from most models on the market, wireless charging is the future of portable devices. HYPHENÂ® 2 features Qi wireless charging without compromising in size. 
After AirPodsÂ®, itâ€™s the smallest model to feature this technology.

settings.heading: anti pressure holes
settings.slide-des:
Anti Pressure Holes eliminate the annoying Stethoscope Effect, allowing you to keep your HYPHENÂ® 2 on all day long.
Additionally, they provide the needed airflow to the driver's diaphragm, further enhancing the audio delivery.

settings.heading: The ultra fast Swiss Army Knife of Cables
settings.slide-des: InChargeÂ® X is the world's only 100W 6-in-1 keyring cable. Thanks to its 6 charging combinations, you can charge almost any device at super high speed.

settings.heading: Ultra Fast Charging
settings.slide-des: InChargeÂ® X allows USB-C to USB-C ultra fast charging up to 100W and iPhone fast charging up to 18W. Thanks to its proprietary chip, inChargeÂ® X can even charge laptops and tablets.

settings.heading: Six in One
settings.slide-des:
inChargeÂ® X is the cable to rule them all.
In one tiny cable you have 6 charging combinations:

â€¢ USB to Lightning
â€¢ USB to USB-C
â€¢ USB to MicroUSB
â€¢ USB-C to USB-C
â€¢ USB-C to Lightning
â€¢ USB-C to MicroUSB

settings.heading: The most durable cable ever made.
settings.slide-des:
Aramid Fiber (A) Increases thermal, chemical and bending resistance.

Braided copper wires (B) 200 braided copper wires allow the current to flow faster, delivering up to 100W.

TPU Cable Guards (C) the single cables are embedded in a flexible and durable TPU layer to increase the bending strength.

Nylon reinforcement (D) The external layer is made of a double weaving Nylon mesh, which substantially increases abrasion resistance.

settings.heading: phone to phone
settings.slide-des:
inChargeÂ® X allows your phone or your tablet to become a power source that you can use when a standard charging port isn't around.
*available when using a USB-C phone as input.

settings.heading: The universal 1.5m/5ft cable
settings.slide-des:
inCharge 6 Max gives you all the features on inCharge 6 in 1.5m/5ft of mobility.
Itâ€™s the only cable you will need for home and travel use.

settings.heading: all the connections you need in a 1.5m/5ft ultra fast cable
settings.slide-des:
inCharge X Max is the only truly universal 100W cable on the market.
It features 6 ultra fast charging combinations, in a single cable.

â€¢ USB to Lightning
â€¢ USB to USB-C
â€¢ USB to MicroUSB
â€¢ USB-C to USB-C
â€¢ USB-C to Lightning
â€¢ USB-C to MicroUSB

settings.heading: Work / Life balance
settings.slide-des: We love to work in a peaceful environment in order to have the best brain storming sessions with the team. A good balance between working life and free time is necessary to always have a fresh point of view, in order to identify problems and find solutions.

settings.heading: the smallest and most durable keyring cable ever created.
settings.slide-des:
inChargeÂ® MINI is the smallest MFi Certified cable for charging and data transfer ever made.

It is available in four combinations to choose from:

â€¢ USB to Lightning (MFiÂ® Certified)
â€¢ USB-C to Lightning (MFiÂ® Certified)
â€¢ USB to USB-C
â€¢ USB-C to USB-C.

settings.slide-des: The ultra fast Swiss Army Knife of cables

settings.code:
Privacy policy

Last updated on February 8th, 2021

The website accessible through www.rollingsquare.com (the "Website") is owned, operated and distributed by Ferraris Group Sagl ("Ferraris Group").

BY ACCESSING ANY PART OF THE WEBSITE, YOU ARE AGREEING TO THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS DESCRIBED BELOW (THE "PRIVACY POLICY") AND THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THE Ferraris Group TERMS OF USE (THE "TERMS OF USE"). IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO ANY OF THESE TERMS, YOU SHOULD NOT USE THIS WEBSITE. This Privacy Policy applies to all users, including both users who are simply viewing the Website and users who are also contributors of content, information, and other materials or services on the Website.

Ferraris Group may, at its sole discretion, modify this Privacy Policy at any time. By accessing the Website at any time after such modifications, you are agreeing to such modifications.

What Personally Identifiable Information Does Ferraris Group Collect?
Ferraris Group collects the following types of personally identifiable information:
â€¢ User Provided Information: You may affirmatively provide Ferraris Group with certain personally identifiable information (such as your name and email address) when participating in various activities on the Website.
â€¢ Information Collected by "Cookies": When you visit the Website, Ferraris Group may send one or more "cookies" to your computer. A "cookie" is a small line of text that is stored within your Web browser, which Ferraris Group uses to help provide better service to you. Your browser has options to accept, reject or provide you with notice when a cookie is sent. Ferraris Group may use cookies for many purposes, including (without limitation) to save your password so you don't have to re-enter it each time you visit the Website, and to deliver content specific to your interests.
â€¢ Log File Information: Ferraris Group's servers automatically record certain information that your web browser sends whenever you visit the Website. These server logs may include information such as your web request, Internet Protocol ("IP") address, browser type, browser language, referring / exit pages and URLs, platform type, number of clicks, domain names, landing pages, pages viewed and the order of those pages, the amount of time spent on particular pages, the date and time of your request, and one or more cookies that may uniquely identify your browser.

How Does Ferraris Group Use Personally Identifiable Information?
If you have not opted out from receiving emails from Ferraris Group, we may use your email address or other personally identifiable information to send commercial or marketing messages. Ferraris Group also may use your email address for non-marketing or administrative purposes (such as notifying you of major Website changes or for customer service purposes). You cannot opt out of receiving emails for non-marketing or administrative purposes.
We'll retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide you with our services. You can ask for your personal information to be deleted at any time or ask for us to send you or a 3rd party your personal information by contacting us via e-mail. Please note that there may be latency in deleting your personal information from our servers and backup storage, and we may retain your personal information in order to comply with the law, protect our rights, resolve disputes or enforce our agreements.

Will Ferraris Group Share Personally Identifiable Information with Others?
Ferraris Group will not share your personally identifiable information (such as name or email address) with other, third-party companies for their commercial or marketing use without your consent or except as part of a specific program or feature for which you have the ability to opt-in or opt-out.
Ferraris Group may provide personally identifiable information to employees, consultants, affiliates or other businesses or persons for the purpose of processing such information on its behalf. In such circumstances, Ferraris Group requires that these parties agree to protect the confidentiality of such information and to comply in all respects with this Privacy Policy. If you wish to be exempt from this processing, you may request via e-mail that we delete your account.
In addition, Ferraris Group may release personally identifiable information: (i) to the extent it has a good-faith belief that such action is necessary to comply with any applicable law, enforce any provision of the Terms of Use, protect itself against any liability, defend itself against any claims, protect the rights, property and personal safety of any user or protect the public welfare; or (ii) to respond to a court order, subpoena, or search warrant.

Is My Information Secure?
Ferraris Group's application databases and related backups are encrypted-at-rest. Transmission of data between application servers, databases, and other services is over secure connections, and users may only connect with our web services using HTTPS. To prevent unauthorized access, our internal databases and application servers require two-factor authentication for all administrators. We employ web application firewalls, attack-detection, and similar services to prevent the unauthorized access of our public-facing services. Applications and underlying systems are monitored for security vulnerabilities and patched in a timely fashion when threats are discovered.
Ferraris Group has implemented security measures to protect personally identifiable information collected on the Website against loss, misuse or alteration. In addition, your account information is protected by a password for your privacy and security. It is important that you protect against unauthorized access to your password and to your computer by logging off once you have finished using a shared computer. Moreover, despite the precautions described above, Ferraris Group cannot and does not guarantee that the individual user information you have transmitted will not be intercepted by others and/or decrypted or accidentally disclosed, and it accepts no liability for any unintentional disclosure.

In the Event of Merger, Sale, or Bankruptcy
In the event that Ferraris Group is acquired by or merged with a third party entity, it reserves the right to transfer or assign the information it has collected from users as part of such merger, acquisition, sale, or other change of control. In the unlikely event of Ferraris Group's bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, receivership, or assignment for the benefit of creditors, or the application of laws or equitable principles affecting creditors' rights generally, Ferraris Group may not be able to control how your personal information is treated, transferred, or used.

Children's Privacy
You must be 18 years and older to register to use the Website. As a result, Ferraris Group does not collect information about children.

Privacy responsible
Lorenzo Filiberto Ferraris CEO, Ferraris Group Sagl

TEL: +41 91 234 6673

settings.heading: EDGE

settings.heading: CHARGE & SYNC
settings.slide-des: Despite being the smallest charging cable on the market, InChargeÂ® Mini also supports data transfer up to 480MBps / 60MBps.

settings.heading: So thin that you wonâ€™t even feel it.
settings.slide-des: With only 4.5 mm of thickness and an ergonomic smooth edges design, EDGE Mount is almost invisible while using and carrying your device.

settings.heading: Enhance your workstation to increase your productivity
settings.slide-des:
Thanks to EDGE, your phone becomes an essential tool to improve the management of your tasks.
Always have charts at sight, never lose important messages and emails, work on mobile interfaces in real time, share your presentation while still seeing other hosts during online meetings.

settings.heading: Stick it anywhere.
settings.slide-des: Place EDGE Mount in the most comfortable spot on your screen, to have your phone under control while working. Thanks to its nanosuction layer, EDGE Mount is universally compatible, no matter the surface.

settings.heading: You can attach EDGE on every laptop, tablet and screen
settings.slide-des:
You can attach EDGE Mount on any side of any of your devices.

The Nano Suction layer will make your set up solid and safe. Inside the packaging you will find one additional Nano Suction layer.

settings.heading: EDGE Magnetic Disc
settings.slide-des:
To increase the strenght of the magnets, EDGE comes with an ultra thin magnetic disc that can be attached to your phone or to your phoneâ€™s case.
Our proprietary magnetic disc is fully compatible with Qi wireless charging.

settings.heading: Design and engineering
settings.slide-des:
EDGE Mount is made of unibody CNC machined aluminium, that ensures high precision and durability.

The high gripping surface and the N52 magnets array have been designed for an ultra holding strength to magnetically snap and support your phone, even in the toughest conditions.

settings.heading: Never run out of battery again.
settings.slide-des: Our Universal Wireless Charger magnetically snaps on your EDGE Mount, it safely holds your phone while fast charging it at up to 15W!

settings.heading: Compatible with iPhoneÂ® MagSafeÂ® and all devices that support wireless charging
settings.slide-des: The EDGE Wireless Charger is fully compatible with iPhone MagSafe devices (12 and up), as well as iPhone 8 and up and all Android devices that support wireless charging.

settings.heading: Universal Wireless ChargerMagnetic Ring
settings.slide-des: Smartphones except iPhone 12, 12 Mini, 12 Pro and 12 Pro Max, donâ€™t feature internal magnets. EDGE Wireless Charger comes with an ultra thin Magnetic Ring that can be attached to your phone or your phoneâ€™s case, to make it fully compatible.

settings.heading: Built to last
settings.slide-des:
Our Universal Wireless Charger is made of unibody CNC machined aluminium, with N52 magnets and an ultra gripping layer on the front surface.

*Only available in Basalt Grey.

settings.heading: Light up your calls
settings.slide-des: The EDGE Light is the missing piece to drastically improve the quality of your online meetings. Thanks to its built-in battery, you can use it with or without a cable.

settings.heading: 280 lumens of pure brightness!
settings.slide-des: A good lighting can be the difference between a professional and an amateur Zoom call.The EDGE Light is designed with your meetings in mind. You can also choose between three level of brightness.

settings.heading: A comfortable pouch designed specifically for the EDGE kit
settings.slide-des: Made of ripstop nylon with heat-sealed seams - the same materials and processes used for naval and military-technical equipment - with a minimal look and the anthracite grey Rolling Square logo screen-printed on the outside.
